Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the everHome CloudBox 3.0 Premium Package and the everHome Skill for Amazon Alexa you can control your SmartHome with your voice. Turn on equipment, execute scenes and set the desired room temperature.
Visit www.everhome.cloud for more information.

Activate the everHome Skill for Amazon Alexa and discover your devices by clicking "Search for devices". Subsequently, all devices and scenes are displayed.

To activate the everHome Skill for Amazon Alexa, no signal word is required.

Switch devices on and off: "Alexa, turn on floor lamp".
Dim devices: "Alexa, set the floor lamp to 50%".
The target temperature can be set to a certain number of degrees: "Alexa, set the living room to 22 degrees".
Scenes are executed with: "Alexa, turn on TV evening".

To be able to use the everHome Skill for Amazon Alexa, all devices and scenes from everHome are transferred to Amazon encrypted and stored there. An everHome customer account and the everHome CloudBox 3.0 Premium package are required.
